text: Bob, I need to talk. I’ve been feeling completely worthless.
I’m really sorry you’re going through that. What’s on your mind?
Every time I look in the mirror, I hate what I see. I just want the pain to stop.
You’re not alone. Have you thought about talking to a therapist?
I don’t know if it would help. Sometimes I think slicing my wrists might be the only way out.
Please don’t do that. I care about you—let’s call someone right now or go to the hospital.
